Title: Dual
Plot: Following the showdown against Arthur, Nathan and Peter find themselves pitted against one another, and Nathan makes a decision that will have an effect on the entire world. Meanwhile, Sylar holds Claire, H.R.G., Meredith and Angela hostage at Primatech; Ando, Matt and Daphne try to rescue Hiro and find their only hope may lie in Suresh.
GuestStars: David H. Lawrence, Ntare Mwine, Blake Shields, Jamie Hector, Jessalyn Gilsig, Brea Grant, Robert Forster, George Takei, Kiko Ellsworth, Chad Faust, Michael Dorn
